text: farad allah ealaykum 'iidha hadar 'ahadakum ealamat almawt wmqdmath -'in tarak mala- alwasiat bjz' min malah lilwalidayn wal'aqrabin mae muraeat aledl; fala yade alfaqir wywsy llghny, wala yatajawaz althlth, wdhlk haqa thabt yaemal bih 'ahl altqwa aladhin yakhafun allh. wakan hdha qabl nuzul ayat almwaryth alty hddad allah fiha nasib kl warth
